programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: A TV news producer prepares an investigation into then presidential candidate George W Bush's military service record, examining allegations that he exploited family connections to avoid being sent to Vietnam and failed to fulfil basic responsibilities as a member of the National Guard. The report proves controversial, and places her career under attack when key evidence is denounced as a forgery. Fact-based drama, starring Cate Blanchett and Robert Redford.

programme.title: Me Him Her
programme.desc: A man travels to Los Angeles on a mission to help his gay best friend, the star of a popular TV show, to come out. The actor's revelation is accelerated when he meets the man of his dreams, but he needs help to cope with media scrutiny - however, his friend has problems of his own, as he starts a romance with a woman whose ex is insanely jealous. Comedy, starring Luke Bracey, Dustin Milligan, Emily Meade and Geena Davis.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg.

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jnr and Scarlett Johansson.

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: A TV news producer prepares an investigation into then presidential candidate George W Bush's military service record, examining allegations that he exploited family connections to avoid being sent to Vietnam and failed to fulfil basic responsibilities as a member of the National Guard. The report proves controversial, and places her career under attack when key evidence is denounced as a forgery. Fact-based drama, starring Cate Blanchett and Robert Redford.

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: A Chilean copper mine collapses, leaving 33 miners trapped underground. As an international rescue effort is organised to reach them, the buried men face a battle for survival over the course of 69 days, in the face of suffocating heat and rising tensions. Fact-based drama, starring Antonio Banderas and Juliette Binoche.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice

A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett.

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jnr and Scarlett Johansson.

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: Premiere. An elite military unit is flown to a top secret facility for a training exercise. The soldiers are intended to be put to the test in a battle simulation against robots, but when the machines start trying to really kill them, they discover a deadly threat to the human race. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vanessa Kirby and Thure Lindhardt.

programme.title: Warsaw 44
programme.desc: A factory worker in Nazi occupied Poland joins a resistance movement. He finds himself torn between two very different women, but all three of them will be drawn into a growing conflict as the approach of the Soviet army inspires the rebels to launch a climactic battle against their oppressors. Second World War drama, starring Jozef Pawlowski and Zofia Wichlacz. In Polish and German.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2 Special
programme.desc: Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Elizabeth Banks discuss reprising their roles for the comedy sequel.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7 Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits the Abu Dhabi set of the action movie sequel, and chats to stars Vin Diesel, Dwayne Johnson and Michelle Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As he behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A political advisor's career ends in disaster when she ends up at the centre of a major scandal. She is lured out of retirement to help the embattled president of Bolivia to get re-elected, but finds the opposition is being assisted by an old rival, who uses every dirty trick in the book to wreck her campaign. Comedy drama, starring Sandra Bullock, Billy Bob Thornton and Anthony Mackie.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Friday Download: The Movie
programme.desc: A group of teenagers on a road trip breaks down in the middle of nowhere, and finds assistance is in short supply. The friends seek shelter in a spooky mansion, but they quickly discover there is more to their refuge than meets the eye. Comedy based on the children's TV series, starring Tyger Drew-Honey and Shannon Flynn.

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: A French acrobat hatches an audacious scheme to carry out his most spectacular performance in 1974. With the aid of his circus mentor and an international team of helpers, he plans to tightrope walk between the towers of the World Trade Centre. Fact-based drama, starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Family man Rusty Griswold spent his childhood family holidays stumbling from one disaster to another with his hapless father. He is determined that his own road trip with his wife and kids will go better - but soon finds the apple has not fallen far from the tree. Sequel to the 1980s comedy series, starring Ed Helms and Christina Applegate, with Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo reprising their roles.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: A woman survives a strange accident that means she never ages. She lives to be over 100, but resists getting close to people for fear of her secret being discovered. She finally falls in love with a man and considers trying to have a relationship with him, only to realise she has a shared history with his father. Romantic fantasy, starring Blake Lively, Michiel Huisman and Harrison Ford.

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Biopic of Stephen Hawking, exploring the renowned astrophysicist's romance with future wife Jane during their time at university in the 1960s and his initial diagnosis with motor neurone disease, which doctors believed would lead to his death within two years. Undaunted by deteriorating health, he continued his groundbreaking research into the origins of the universe. Starring an Oscar-winning Eddie Redmayne, with Felicity Jones and David Thewlis.

programme.title: The Man from UNCLE
programme.desc: A CIA agent is forced into an uneasy alliance with his arch-rival in the KGB at the height of the Cold War. A criminal organisation is planning to alter the balance of power by making nuclear weapons widely available, and the two spies must work together to foil the plan. Action adventure based on the 1960s TV series, starring Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer, Alicia Vikander and Hugh Grant.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retiree grows tired of the quiet life and becomes an intern at a start-up run by a beautiful entrepreneur, and teaches the young staff a few things about successful business. Comedy, starring Robert De Niro, Anne Hathaway and Rene Russo.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogramme the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel.(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: A French acrobat hatches an audacious scheme to carry out his most spectacular performance in 1974. With the aid of his circus mentor and an international team of helpers, he plans to tightrope walk between the towers of the World Trade Centre. Fact-based drama, starring Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: Selma
programme.desc: In 1965, amidst an atmosphere of racial unrest, civil rights campaigner Dr Martin Luther King Jr plans a peaceful march across Alabama from Selma to Montgomery. His goal is to persuade President Lyndon B Johnson to change the law, allowing black people to register to vote. Fact-based drama, starring David Oyelowo, Tom Wilkinson and Carmen Ejogo.(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: The singing rodents mistakenly come to the conclusion that their human friend Dave intends to get rid of them when he proposes to his girlfriend in Miami. With only three days until Dave pops the question, the trio embark on a desperate road trip across America to sabotage his romantic plans. Family comedy sequel, starring Jason Lee and Kimberly Williams-Paisley.(n)

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: An inventive chef's unconventional methods make him the toast of Paris, but his career is derailed by an alcohol and drugs-fuelled meltdown. An old friend offers him a second chance by hiring him to take over the kitchens of an exclusive London restaurant, but has a hard time keeping his acerbic nature in check. Drama, starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller, Daniel Bruhl, Emma Thompson and Uma Thurman.(n)

programme.title: Grimsby
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated at birth, the younger growing up to be MI6's top agent while the older becomes a layabout football hooligan. When they are finally reunited, the dim-witted elder sibling ends up helping his brother foil an evil plan that threatens the entire world. Action comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Mark Strong and Rebel Wilson.(n)

programme.title: How to be Single
programme.desc: A woman who has rarely been without a boyfriend moves to New York following a break-up with her boyfriend. She makes a fun-loving new friend, who introduces her to the city's nightlife and teaches her to enjoy the advantages of being single. Comedy, starring Dakota Johnson, Rebel Wilson, Alison Brie and Leslie Mann.(n)

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Comedy mixing live action and animation, set in a 1940s Hollywood where cartoon characters are real. A seedy private eye with a hatred of `toons' reluctantly ends up helping to clear an animated rabbit accused of murdering his wife's human lover. Starring Bob Hoskins, Christopher Lloyd, Joanna Cassidy and Stubby Kaye, with voices supplied by Mel Blanc, Kathleen Turner and Charles Fleischer.(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: The singing rodents mistakenly come to the conclusion that their human friend Dave intends to get rid of them when he proposes to his girlfriend in Miami. With only three days until Dave pops the question, the trio embark on a desperate road trip across America to sabotage his romantic plans. Family comedy sequel, starring Jason Lee and Kimberly Williams-Paisley.(n)

When they are finally reunited, the dim-witted elder sibling ends up helping his brother foil an evil plan that threatens the entire world. Action comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Mark Strong and Rebel Wilson.(n)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: The dying wife of a retired assassin leaves him a puppy, in the hope that having something to love will stop him returning to a life of violence when she is gone. When the son of a Russian gangster steals his car and kills the dog, the hitman is provoked into a murderous rage and slaughters his way through the underworld in search of revenge. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves and Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: Birdman: Or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) (2014)
programme.desc: A faded movie star famous for his role in a series of superhero movies 20 years previously tries to reclaim his artisitic integrity by directing and starring in a Broadway play. The experience plunges him into a personal crisis as both the production and his own family are beset by a series of disasters. Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Keaton, Edward Norton and Emma Stone.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.(n)

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Comedy mixing live action and animation, set in a 1940s Hollywood where cartoon characters are real. A seedy private eye with a hatred of `toons' reluctantly ends up helping to clear an animated rabbit accused of murdering his wife's human lover. Starring Bob Hoskins, Christopher Lloyd, Joanna Cassidy and Stubby Kaye, with voices supplied by Mel Blanc, Kathleen Turner and Charles Fleischer.(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town singer creates a bold alternate identity for herself, and records a music video. The song becomes an internet sensation and she soon finds her alter ego becoming a huge star - but risks losing touch with the things that matter the most to her. Drama based on the 1980s cartoon series, starring Aubrey Peeples, Stefanie Scott and Molly Ringwald.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Obi-Wan Kenobi and Qui-Gon Jinn are instructed to protect Queen Amidala when her planet is invaded. Escorting her away from danger, they meet gifted youngster Anakin Skywalker, who seems ideally suited to join the pair's order - but is unaware of just how powerful he could become. Sci-fi prequel, starring Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman and Ray Park.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and apprentice Anakin Skywalker are sent to protect Senator Padme Amidala from an assassin. However, as galactic civil war threatens to erupt, the pair are forced to split their efforts, leading Anakin into an ill-advised romance and the beginnings of a journey toward the dark side. George Lucas's second prequel to the original sci-fi trilogy, starring Ewan McGregor, Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: Troubled Anakin Skywalker finds himself seduced by the dark side of the Force and is tempted into betraying his fellow Jedi Knights as conflict erupts across countless planets and the forces of evil prepare to seize control of the galaxy. The final instalment of the sci-fi prequel trilogy, with Hayden Christensen, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Samuel L Jackson, Ian McDiarmid and Christopher Lee.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: Farm boy Luke Skywalker is thrust into an intergalactic battle between good and evil while trying to rescue a spirited princess from the clutches of the evil Darth Vader. En route, he is helped by a cocky space pilot, a veteran warrior, two bickering robots and a hairy 8ft alien. Sci-fi adventure directed by George Lucas, with Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness and Peter Cushing.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: The rebels are scattered across the galaxy after the Empire launches a devastating attack on their secret base. Luke Skywalker searches out a Jedi master to complete his training, while Han Solo and Princess Leia are relentlessly pursued by Darth Vader's space fleet. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams, Alec Guinness and David Prowse.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
programme.desc: The rebel heroes set out to rescue Han Solo from the clutches of alien gangster Jabba the Hutt before preparing for a decisive attack on the evil Empire. Meanwhile, Luke Skywalker faces a more personal battle in a final confrontation with Darth Vader that leads him to the inner sanctum of the Emperor himself. Conclusion of the original sci-fi trilogy, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford and Carrie Fisher.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A stormtrooper fighting for an evil regime turns against his masters. He joins forces with a desert scavenger, and together they are drawn into the search for legendary war hero Luke Skywalker, who disappeared years previously. Meanwhile, a terrible weapon is about to be unleashed, that will allow the forces of evil to dominate the galaxy once again. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Harrison Ford and Adam Driver.(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Maverick cop Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles when an investigation into a colleague's murder leads him to a Hollywood theme park. He enlists the help of old ally Rosewood to prove the resort is a cover for a major counterfeiting ring connected to a terrorist conspiracy. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Theresa Randle and Bronson Pinchot.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: A cash-strapped chauffeur is up to his neck in debt to a bookie, but thinks that escorting a billionaire around LA will raise enough money to pay off his creditor. Unfortunately, his wealthy passenger turns out to be not only crazy, but also a wanted man. Comedy thriller, starring Patrick Wilson, Chris Pine and Jessica Alba.

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Two romantic rivals are both granted the secret of eternal youth by a mysterious mystic. However, as they battle to get their claws into a plastic surgeon, they discover their now-immortal bodies are capable of taking whatever damage they can dish out. Black comedy fantasy, starring Goldie Hawn, Meryl Streep, Bruce Willis and Isabella Rossellini.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.

programme.title: Rock the Kasbah
programme.desc: A has-been rock manager is left stranded in war-torn Kabul after his last remaining client abandons him. He meets a local teenager who has dreams of becoming a pop star, and tries to make her the first female contestant on a TV talent show, assisted by a prostitute, a mercenary and a couple of war profiteers. Comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Leem Lubany, Bruce Willis, Kate Hudson and Zooey Deschanel.

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: A singer is transformed from naive country boy to the greatest rock 'n' roll legend of all time - with the traditional stand-bys of sex, drugs, failed marriages, falls from grace, spectacular comebacks and the love of a good woman along the way. Comedy spoof of music biopics, starring John C Reilly, Jenna Fischer and Raymond J Barry, and featuring appearances from Jack Black and Jack White.

programme.title: Year One
programme.desc: An inept hunter and his shy gatherer sidekick are kicked out of their tribe and left to wander the Old Testament world. Blundering through several key moments of the Bible, they eventually end up at Sodom, where they must try and rescue their people from slavery. Comedy, starring Jack Black, Michael Cera, Oliver Platt and Hank Azaria.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A lazy twentysomething lives off his wealthy hotel magnate father. When the old man decides to retire, he begins to question whether his layabout son is suitable to take over the family empire and issues a challenge - he must retake 12 years of school in 24 weeks, or lose everything. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler, Bridgette Wilson, Darren McGavin and Bradley Whitford.

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: A deskbound CIA agent provides valuable background support for a dashing secret agent, but has never gone into action herself. Everything changes, when the spy mysteriously vanishes, and she leaps into action to take his place, infiltrating the inner circle of a ruthless arms dealer and trying to avert a global catastrophe. Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: The bumbling security guard is invited to attend a conference in Las Vegas, and brings his teenage daughter along for a family holiday before she leaves for college. However, he is forced to leap into action when he uncovers a gang of criminals are plotting a casino heist. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Raini Rodriguez.

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: A deskbound CIA agent provides valuable background support for a dashing secret agent, but has never gone into action herself. Everything changes, when the spy mysteriously vanishes, and she leaps into action to take his place, infiltrating the inner circle of a ruthless arms dealer and trying to avert a global catastrophe. Comedy adventure, starring Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters are reunited when their parents decide to sell the house they grew up in. They return to the family home to clear out their childhood bedrooms, but with their parents away, seize the chance to relive their teenage years and throw one last wild house party. Comedy, starring Amy Poehler, Tina Fey and Dianne Wiest.

programme.title: The Overnight
programme.desc: A couple and their young son move to another city, and find themselves feeling adrift in a strange place. Things seem to change for the better when they meet another family and spend the evening at their new friends' house - but things quickly take a disturbing turn once the kids are in bed. Black comedy, starring Adam Scott, Taylor Schilling and Jason Schwartzman.(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: A socially awkward young groom-to-be hires a professional best man to make him look good at his forthcoming wedding. Convincing his fiancee and guests that they really do know each other proves to be problematic, but at least a real friendship begins to develop between the mismatched pair. Comedy, starring Josh Gad, Kevin Hart and Kaley Cuoco-Sweeting.(n)

programme.title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
programme.desc: A would-be rock star flees his repressive Christian father in search of stardom, teaming up with a laid-back guitarist along the way. However, for the duo to become the rock gods they are surely destined to be, they must find a magical guitar pick that gives its owner unprecedented musical prowess - a quest that leads them to a confrontation with Satan himself. Comedy, starring Jack Black, Kyle Gass, Meat Loaf, Dave Grohl, Tim Robbins, Ben Stiller and John C Reilly.(n)

programme.title: The Grass Is Greener
programme.desc: An English earl is forced to open his stately home to the public to avoid going broke. When one of the tourists, an American tycoon, takes an interest in his wife, the peer enlists the aid of an old flame to save his marriage. Romantic comedy, starring Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Robert Mitchum and Jean Simmons.(n)

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: Two estranged brothers find themselves trapped together on a snowy mountain after they try and evict a squatter from a family cabin. Comedy drama, starring Chace Crawford, Tyler Labine and Britt Irvin.(n)

programme.title: Loser
programme.desc: A hard-working college student is branded a loser by his roommates, who promptly oust him from their group. When he helps a girl deal with an unpleasant drugs-related experience, he falls madly in love with her - but she only has eyes for a professor. Comedy, starring Jason Biggs, Mena Suvari, Greg Kinnear, Zak Orth, Thomas Sadoski and Dan Aykroyd.(n)

programme.title: Stage Fright
programme.desc: A hopeful young singer is terrorised by a masked killer at a performing-arts camp. Horror musical, starring Allie MacDonald, Meat Loaf Aday and Minnie Driver.(n)

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: A bored African prince defies his father's plans for an arranged marriage and escapes to the USA to find a bride on his own terms. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy and Arsenio Hall in several roles, with James Earl Jones, Allison Dean, Eriq La Salle and Madge Sinclair.(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Excitable beat cop Ben longs to work alongside his fiancee's brother, hard-boiled detective James, who does not think he has what it takes. James decides to show Ben that he is not cut out for the job by recruiting him to help bring a drug dealer to justice. Comedy sequel, starring Ice Cube, Kevin Hart and Olivia Munn.(n)

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A Nascar racing champion has everything he could want - until an arrogant French rival seizes the title from him, and his wife runs off with his best friend. Forced to move back in with his mother, the downhearted driver turns to his estranged father for help rebuilding his shattered self-confidence. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, John C Reilly and Sacha Baron Cohen.(n)

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: A professional relationship guru, who specialises in offering advice to lonely single men, helps an unlucky-in-love accountant to woo the girl of his dreams. However, when he finds himself falling for a beautiful gossip columnist, his usual charm abandons him and he discovers his expertise counts for nothing. Romantic comedy, with Will Smith, Eva Mendes, Kevin James, Amber Valletta, Julie Ann Emery, Adam Arkin and Michael Rapaport.(n)

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: A bored African prince defies his father's plans for an arranged marriage and escapes to the USA to find a bride on his own terms. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy and Arsenio Hall in several roles, with James Earl Jones, Allison Dean, Eriq La Salle and Madge Sinclair.(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Excitable beat cop Ben longs to work alongside his fiancee's brother, hard-boiled detective James, who does not think he has what it takes. James decides to show Ben that he is not cut out for the job by recruiting him to help bring a drug dealer to justice. Comedy sequel, starring Ice Cube, Kevin Hart and Olivia Munn.(n)

programme.title: Bruno
programme.desc: A gay Austrian fashion journalist becomes a figure of hate in his own country, and heads to America in search of celebrity with his adoring assistant in tow. He embarks on a campaign of publicity stunts to make himself famous, encountering prejudice and meeting people similarly desperate for stardom. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen and Gustaf Hammarsten.(n)

programme.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
programme.desc: The crusading grown-ups of the Colorado town lead America into war against Canada in a bid to eradicate bad language from TV. The four young heroes set out to bring peace to the world, but have to battle a fearsome alliance between Satan and Saddam Hussein. Animated musical comedy, with the voices of Trey Parker and Matt Stone, as well as George Clooney, Eric Idle and Isaac Hayes.(n)

programme.title: Blazing Saddles
programme.desc: A crooked railway tycoon whose men are terrorising a frontier town arranges for a black sheriff to be appointed, hoping the racist residents will reject him. The lawman proves more cunning than expected, and with the help of a drunken gunslinger, runs rings around the businessman. Mel Brooks' Western spoof, in which he co-stars alongside Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder and Madeline Kahn.(n)

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: The bungling Inspector Clouseau is sent to investigate a high-profile murder case. All the clues point to a maid being the guilty party, but the accident-prone detective is instantly smitten with her, and devotes his efforts to proving her innocence - despite all evidence to the contrary. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers, Elke Sommer, George Sanders and Herbert Lom.(n)

programme.title: Big Hero 6 Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits Disney studios to go behind the scenes of the animated adventure about a boy and his robot who join a team of superheroes.(n)

programme.title: I Spy
programme.desc: A hapless spy is assigned to track down an underground arms dealer who has stolen a prototype jet fighter. His superiors decide the best way for him to get close to his target is to pose as an assistant to an egotistical boxing champion, who revels at the chance to become a secret agent. Spy comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Eddie Murphy, Owen Wilson, Famke Janssen and Malcolm McDowell.(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: A child psychologist's well-ordered world begins to fall apart when his live-in girlfriend announces she is pregnant. Not fond of children anyway, he dreads the impact a baby will make on his life - and to make matters worse, their eccentric Russian obstetrician admits he has never delivered a baby before. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Julianne Moore, Jeff Goldblum, Joan Cusack and Tom Arnold, with Robin Williams in a cameo role.(n)

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Three kids fall foul of the local bully on their first day at high school, so they advertise for a bodyguard. They end up hiring a man who turns out to be a low-rent mercenary, but discover their new-found protector is not quite the hardened soldier of fortune he claims to be. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Leslie Mann, Nate Hartley and Troy Gentile.(n)

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: A corrupt businessman is convicted of fraud, and given 30 days to put his affairs in order before starting a prison sentence. He assumes a black employee has a criminal past, and seeks his help in preparing for a life behind bars - not realising that the financially struggling working stiff has never broken the law in his life. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Kevin Hart.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.(n)

programme.title: Zoolander 2
programme.desc: A dim-witted supermodel must step back into the spotlight and save the day when someone starts murdering pop stars. Comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller and Owen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: A teenage girl finds herself pregnant after a one-night stand with her best friend. Deciding to give her baby up for adoption, she thinks she has found the perfect parents in a yuppie couple. However, over the next nine months she begins to experience doubts about her plans. Comedy, starring Ellen Page, Michael Cera, Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman.(n)

programme.title: The Bad Education Movie
programme.desc: Incompetent teacher Alfie Wickers decides his students deserve a treat for somehow passing their GCSEs, so decides to take them on the greatest school trip of their lives - to Cornwall. However, a series of disasters leaves the class into trouble with suspicious locals. Comedy, starring Jack Whitehall, Harry Enfield and Iain Glen.(n)

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: A corrupt businessman is convicted of fraud, and given 30 days to put his affairs in order before starting a prison sentence. He assumes a black employee has a criminal past, and seeks his help in preparing for a life behind bars - not realising that the financially struggling working stiff has never broken the law in his life. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Kevin Hart.(n)

programme.title: Zoolander 2
programme.desc: A dim-witted supermodel must step back into the spotlight and save the day when someone starts murdering pop stars. Comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller and Owen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A wealthy old man dying of cancer arranges to have his consciousness transplanted into a younger body. The procedure is a success, but he begins to have suspicions about where his new body came from - only to find that the company behind the process will kill to protect their dark secrets. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds and Ben Kingsley.

programme.title: Bad Asses On The Bayou
programme.desc: Two ageing vigilantes team up and head to Louisiana to track down a kidnapped friend. Tongue-in-cheek action adventure, starring Danny Trejo, Danny Glover and John Amos.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Ben Gates sets out to clear the family name when evidence emerges that an ancestor was involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. His mission leads him on another globe-trotting treasure hunt that uncovers a secret conspiracy. Adventure sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Helen Mirren, Ed Harris, Harvey Keitel and Jon Voight.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Two expeditions set out to climb to the summit of the world's highest mountain. Both parties of mountaineers get caught in one of the fiercest snowstorms ever recorded, and face a desperate struggle to survive against the elements. Fact-based adventure, starring Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, Jake Gyllenhaal and Keira Knightley.

programme.title: Poseidon
programme.desc: A cruise ship capsizes in a tidal wave on New Year's Eve. A small band of survivors, including a professional gambler, a father searching for his missing daughter, a stowaway and a suicidal man who has regained his will to live, battles to get to the surface and escape the sinking vessel. Remake of 1970s disaster movie The Poseidon Adventure, starring Kurt Russell, Richard Dreyfuss and Josh Lucas.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of genetically engineered clones bred to be the perfect assassin takes on a mission that strikes close to home. A corporation intends to use the technology that created him to build an army of superhuman killers. As the assassin fights to bring them down, he uncovers the dark secrets surrounding his origin. Action thriller, starring Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware and Zachary Quinto.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a Los Angeles rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state to try and rescue his daughter. Disaster movie, starring Dwayne Johnson and Carla Gugino.

programme.title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
programme.desc: Moses, the adoptive brother of the pharaoh of Egypt, is sent into exile, where he receives a message from God demanding he set all the country's slaves free. When his brother refuses to comply, the kingdom is struck by a series of devastating plagues. Biblical epic, starring Christian Bale, Joel Edgerton, Sigourney Weaver and John Turturro.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Two expeditions set out to climb to the summit of the world's highest mountain. Both parties of mountaineers get caught in one of the fiercest snowstorms ever recorded, and face a desperate struggle to survive against the elements. Fact-based adventure, starring Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, Jake Gyllenhaal and Keira Knightley.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ethan Hunt is called out of retirement when an ex-trainee is taken hostage by a ruthless arms dealer, but when the rescue operation goes wrong, the villain decides to target Hunt's fiancee. Action thriller sequel directed by JJ Abrams, starring Tom Cruise, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Michelle Monaghan, Ving Rhames and Simon Pegg.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of genetically engineered clones bred to be the perfect assassin takes on a mission that strikes close to home. A corporation intends to use the technology that created him to build an army of superhuman killers. As the assassin fights to bring them down, he uncovers the dark secrets surrounding his origin. Action thriller, starring Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware and Zachary Quinto.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a Los Angeles rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state to try and rescue his daughter. Disaster movie, starring Dwayne Johnson and Carla Gugino.

programme.title: Alien Resurrection
programme.desc: Scientists create a clone of Ripley to get hold of the alien queen growing inside her body and breed a new race of the monsters. However, when the creatures escape and turn on their makers, the new Ripley must lead a smuggling crew caught up in the mayhem to safety. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder and Ron Perlman.(n)

programme.title: Barely Lethal
programme.desc: A teenage secret agent longs to lead a normal life, so decides to fake her own death and enrol in a high school as an exchange student. However, she soon discovers that navigating teenage social hierarchy can be just as dangerous as international espionage. Action comedy, starring Hailee Steinfeld, Samuel L Jackson and Jessica Alba.(n)

programme.title: Eragon
programme.desc: A young farm boy discovers a dragon's egg, which hatches into the last surviving specimen of its mighty race. His friendship with the winged creature soon comes in handy when he discovers he is destined to overthrow the evil tyrant who has taken control of the kingdom. Fantasy adventure, starring Ed Speleers, Jeremy Irons, Robert Carlyle and Sienna Guillory, with Rachel Weisz providing the voice of the dragon.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: The CIA becomes suspicious of Russia's nuclear activities, and agent Jack Ryan is ordered to investigate. However, it is not long before the threat of terrorists detonating a nuclear bomb on American soil is on the cards, sparking a race against the clock to avert disaster. Thriller based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Ben Affleck, Morgan Freeman, James Cromwell, Liev Schreiber, Bridget Moynahan and Alan Bates.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: A veteran car thief is forced out of retirement to steal 50 top-of-the-range vehicles in exchange for his brother's life. While his sibling is held hostage by a sadistic gangster, he asks his former cronies to help - but with the clock ticking and just a few days remaining to pull off the daunting task, their chances of success are hanging by a thread. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Angelina Jolie, Giovanni Ribisi and Robert Duvall.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: The team of secret agents faces being shut down when the head of the CIA convinces the US Senate that it is too dangerous. The operatives of the Impossible Mission Force become fugitives when they defy orders and plot to bring down a shadowy society of assassins. Spy thriller sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Rebecca Ferguson and Simon Pegg.(n)

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: A hitman working for a longtime friend who has become head of a crime syndicate becomes disillusioned with his life and haunted by his past misdeeds. He is forced to turn against the syndicate and place himself in the firing line when he learns a hit has been ordered on his own estranged son. Action thriller, starring Liam Neeson and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: The team of secret agents faces being shut down when the head of the CIA convinces the US Senate that it is too dangerous. The operatives of the Impossible Mission Force become fugitives when they defy orders and plot to bring down a shadowy society of assassins. Spy thriller sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Rebecca Ferguson and Simon Pegg.(n)

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: A hitman working for a longtime friend who has become head of a crime syndicate becomes disillusioned with his life and haunted by his past misdeeds. He is forced to turn against the syndicate and place himself in the firing line when he learns a hit has been ordered on his own estranged son. Action thriller, starring Liam Neeson and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: A former member of the US Army Special Forces returns to his home town, only to find the pleasant rural backwater he once loved has become a criminal haven. Determined to restore order, he sets out to take down those responsible for the town's decline. Action adventure remake of the cult 1973 film, starring Dwayne Johnson, Johnny Knoxville, Neal McDonough and Kristen Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Sword of Vengeance
programme.desc: In 11th century Britain, a mysterious stranger known only as Shadow Walker returns home after years in slavery and immediately turns a group of local men into ruthless killers - but do they have the ability to overthrow their tyrannical ruler? Action adventure, with Stanley Weber and Annabelle Wallis.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: A truck driver accepts a challenge to deliver a consignment of beer to a party. He claims he can make the 900-mile round trip in just 28 hours, but a pompous sheriff is determined to stop him in his tracks, not least because his prospective daughter-in-law has deserted his son and hitched a ride with the unlikely hero. Comedy, starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Sally Field and Jerry Reed.(n)

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit II
programme.desc: The maverick haulier must overcome a crisis of confidence when he and his friends are hired to transport a pregnant elephant to Texas, a mammoth task that proves far from easy, especially with their old enemy in hot pursuit. Road comedy, with Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed, Dom DeLuise and Sally Field.(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: A whaling ship sets sail from New England in 1820, only to come under attack from a gigantic whale that seems to want revenge on them. In the aftermath of the attack, the surviving members of the crew face further physical and moral challenges as they try to stay alive on the open sea. Fact-based historical adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy and Ben Whishaw.(n)

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: A storm-chaser and her estranged husband are brought together in a joint project to monitor the path of an oncoming tornado - but the pair face a race against the clock as a rival government-backed group with hi-tech resources tries to beat them to it. Action thriller, starring Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Daredevil explorers Rick and Evelyn O'Connell are called into action when their son accidentally resurrects the evil Chinese Emperor Han from his ancient tomb. The family now faces a race against time to prevent the merciless leader from awakening his vast terracotta army in a plot to take over the world. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Maria Bello, Jet Li and Michelle Yeoh.(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: A whaling ship sets sail from New England in 1820, only to come under attack from a gigantic whale that seems to want revenge on them. In the aftermath of the attack, the surviving members of the crew face further physical and moral challenges as they try to stay alive on the open sea. Fact-based historical adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy and Ben Whishaw.(n)

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace.(n)

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: The caped crusader and his sidekick take on the villainous Mr Freeze, who plans to destroy Gotham City with an icy doomsday weapon unless his demands are met. The dynamic duo also have to contend with femme fatale Poison Ivy, who is determined to drive a wedge between them. Comic-book adventure, starring George Clooney, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Uma Thurman and Chris O'Donnell.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Superman's home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey.

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Battle of Gods
programme.desc: A team of super-powered warriors who once saved Earth reunites to face a new threat. An ancient god of destruction awakens and seeks them out in search of a new challenge. The leader of the band of heroes must find a way to increase his own powers to match his enemy in battle. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Sean Schemmel and Jason Douglas.

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Resurrection F
programme.desc: When evil overlord Frieza is resurrected and plans to take revenge on the Z-Fighters, only Goku and Vegeta can stop him. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Sean Schemmel, Christopher R Sabat and Christopher Ayres.

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: As the machines threaten the last refuge of humanity, a party of freedom fighters journeys into the virtual world of the Matrix to find a means to end the war once and for all. However, the computer programme Agent Smith, once a tool of the machines, has returned from the dead with his own plans for the world. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Laurence Fishburne and Hugo Weaving.

programme.title: Dragonball Z: Battle of Gods
programme.desc: A team of super-powered warriors who once saved Earth reunites to face a new threat. An ancient god of destruction awakens and seeks them out in search of a new challenge. The leader of the band of heroes must find a way to increase his own powers to match his enemy in battle. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Sean Schemmel and Jason Douglas.

However, the computer programme Agent Smith, once a tool of the machines, has returned from the dead with his own plans for the world. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Laurence Fishburne and Hugo Weaving.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-vampire possesses all the strengths inherent in bloodsuckers with none of their weaknesses, and is determined to wipe the monsters from the face of the Earth. However, he faces a deadly new threat in a renegade vampire who is close to decoding an ancient prophecy that will allow him to repopulate the world with his kind. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff and Kris Kristofferson.

programme.title: The Crow
programme.desc: A guitarist and his fiancee are murdered on Halloween by the henchman of a world-weary gangster. One year later, the musician is restored to the land of the living by a mystical crow, and rendered indestructible so he can take revenge on the killers. Fantasy thriller based on the graphic novel, starring Brandon Lee, Michael Wincott and Ernie Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: A vampire fights a war against werewolves that has raged for centuries, with the human race oblivious to the conflict. She falls in love with a mortal man who has wandered unwittingly into the midst of a conflict, and must protect him from both the enemy, who have plans for him, and her own side. Supernatural action thriller, starring Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Michael Sheen and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Rogue One Special
programme.desc: The making of the new standalone entry into the Star Wars series of movies, telling the story of the group of rebels who stole the plans for the original Death Star.(n)

programme.title: Big Hero 6 Special
programme.desc: Alex Zane visits Disney studios to go behind the scenes of the animated adventure about a boy and his robot who join a team of superheroes.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man: Behind the Scenes
programme.desc: The making of the Marvel movie Ant-Man, starring Paul Rudd as the tiny hero.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Mendes and Wes Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: The super-powered team takes on a mysterious alien who has been sent by his planet-eating master to prepare Earth for obliteration. While the four heroes try to find a way to foil its plans, an old enemy returns, intent on seizing the extraterrestrial's power. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Michael Chiklis, Chris Evans and Jessica Alba, with the voice of Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions
programme.desc: As the survivors of the human race make their last stand against the machines, freedom fighters Neo and Trinity undertake a desperate journey into the heart of the enemy stronghold seeking a way to end the war, while the rogue computer programme Smith sets about remaking the virtual world of the Matrix in his own image. Conclusion of the sci-fi trilogy, starring Keanu Reeves, Carrie-Anne Moss, Laurence Fishburne and Hugo Weaving.(n)

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: A fast-talking former mercenary develops terminal cancer, and agrees to be the subject in a shady experiment in the hope of a cure. The procedure leaves him horribly disfigured, but also possessing superhuman abilities which he immediately puts to use in a quest for revenge on the man responsible for his hideous appearance. Superhero comedy adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds and Morena Baccarin.(n)

programme.title: Catwoman
programme.desc: A graphic designer working for a cosmetics firm discovers her employer's products are lethal - and is promptly murdered for her trouble. However, she is given a chance to avenge herself when a goddess in feline form breathes new life into her body and endows her with the strength and agility of a cat. Superhero adventure, starring Halle Berry, Sharon Stone and Benjamin Bratt.(n)

Superhero comedy adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds and Morena Baccarin.(n)

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: A scientist working on synthetic skin is horribly disfigured and left for dead by a criminal gang. Now unable to feel pain, he continues his research, creating artificial faces that will last for only a short time. He uses these disguises to aid him in taking revenge on those who mutilated him - while also using a mask of his own face to see the girlfriend who thinks he died. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson and Frances McDormand.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man: Behind the Scenes
programme.desc: The making of the Marvel movie Ant-Man, starring Paul Rudd as the tiny hero.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: A mystical artefact is stolen from a top-secret military base by Thor's brother Loki, who plans to use it to bring about an alien invasion. Spymaster Nick Fury brings together a team of superheroes, including Iron Man, Thor, Captain America and the Hulk, to defend Earth from the impending attack. Action adventure uniting the Marvel comic-book characters, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson, Tom Hiddleston, Jeremy Renner and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: The superhero team faces a threat from within when Iron Man creates an artificial intelligence to take their place protecting the world. The android grows resentful of his creators, and decides his mission is best accomplished by wiping out the human race. Meanwhile, two vengeful superpowered twins seek to turn the Avengers against each other. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Hemsworth, Chris Evans and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jnr and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jnr and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco
programme.desc: Two dogs and a cat are left to fend for themselves on the streets of San Francisco when their owners fly off on holiday and accidentally leave them behind. As they join a tough group of strays, they must avoid falling into the clutches of the sinister dog catchers. Adventure sequel, with the voices of Michael J Fox, Sally Field and Ralph Waite.

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphan is forced to live a life of servitude by her cruel stepmother. The king of the realm she lives in organises a lavish ball to find a bride for his son, and a caring fairy godmother puts her magic to the task of turning the downtrodden girl into a princess. Disney animated fairytale, with the voices of Ilene Woods, William Phipps and Verna Felton.

programme.title: The Search for Santa Paws
programme.desc: Santa Claus and his faithful dog travel to New York to spread some festive spirit, but an accident results in the kindly old man losing his memory. His four-legged friend strives to make sure he recovers in time for the big day, with the help of two orphans. Family adventure, starring Kaitlyn Maher and Madison Pettis, with the voice of Mitchel Musso.

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Legend of the NeverBeast
programme.desc: One of Tinker Bell's friends meets a large hairy monster, and discovers he is not as fearsome as he looks. However, she has a hard time convincing the other fairies to accept him, and needs the help of her friends to protect the creature. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Ginnifer Goodwin and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: WALL.E
programme.desc: In the far future, waste collection robot WALL.E is the only unit left to clean up a desolate and dilapidated Earth. But when a survey droid arrives to search for any signs of life, WALL.E is lovestruck and hitches a ride on the spaceship sent to collect her, embarking on a journey that could determine the future of the human race. Pixar animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard and Sigourney Weaver.

programme.title: BURN.E
programme.desc: Short Pixar animated adventure featuring characters from WALL.E and set during the events of the movie. WALL.E's adventures on the starship Axiom accidentally cause no end of trouble for a welding robot trying to fix the vessel's hull. With the voices of Angus MacLane and Tessa Swigart.

programme.title: Up
programme.desc: An old man attaches thousands of balloons to his house so he can fly it to South America, and fulfil his late wife's dream of exploring the jungle. However, once airborne, he finds he has an unwanted stowaway in the shape of an excitable boy scout. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Ed Asner, Jordan Nagai and Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: Cowboy doll Woody is stolen by an unscrupulous toy collector, who knows he is worth a fortune as a collectible, prompting fearless Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear to lead a daring across-town mission to rescue him. However, Woody is tempted to spend his life languishing in the safety of a museum rather than face the prospect of his owner growing up. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: A man raised by gorillas in the jungle has his first encounter with humans in the form of a scientist and his daughter, and is torn between remaining among the apes or rediscovering his roots. He must also fight to defend his animal friends from a big-game hunter. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Tony Goldwyn and Minnie Driver.

programme.title: Feast
programme.desc: A dog named Winston loves eating, until his owner feeds him vegetables. Animated short, directed by Patrick Osborne.

programme.title: Big Hero 6
programme.desc: A lonely, orphaned computer genius forms a special bond with an inflatable robot. When a devastating event occurs in their futuristic home city, they join forces with a group of friends to form a hi-tech group of heroes who are determined to get to the bottom of the matter. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit and Daniel Henney.

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.

programme.title: Big Hero 6
programme.desc: A lonely, orphaned computer genius forms a special bond with an inflatable robot. When a devastating event occurs in their futuristic home city, they join forces with a group of friends to form a hi-tech group of heroes who are determined to get to the bottom of the matter. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit and Daniel Henney.(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur: Sky Movies Special
programme.desc: Sky Movies takes a special look at Pixar's animated prehistoric adventure.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.(n)

programme.title: Lilo & Stitch
programme.desc: A manic, mischievous alien escapes from the galactic police and crash-lands his spaceship on Hawaii. A lonely little girl mistakes the stranded creature for a dog and adopts him - but alien and Earth authorities are soon combing the island in search of him. Disney animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Daveigh Chase, Chris Sanders, Tia Carrere, Ving Rhames and David Ogden Stiers.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: Pocahontas
programme.desc: A Native American princess falls in love with an English settler, but her father is distrustful of the Europeans - not without just cause, as a cruel governor is prepared to wage war to get his hands on the gold he believes they are hiding. Disney animated drama, with the voices of Irene Bedard, Mel Gibson and Christian Bale.(n)

programme.title: Tangled
programme.desc: A baby princess's hair has mystical powers, so an evil witch kidnaps her and locks her in a tower, hoping to use the magic to fend off old age. When the princess is a teenager with 70-foot long tresses, she escapes with the aid of a bandit and goes in search of her home, but the witch is not going to let her go without a fight. Disney animated comedy based on the Rapunzel story, with the voices of Mandy Moore and Zachary Levi.(n)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Toy Story That Time Forgot
programme.desc: Woody, Buzz and some of the other toys are taken to visit a friend of their new owner Bonnie. They encounter a range of dinosaur action figures, but discover they do not know they are toys. When the leader of the prehistoric monsters decides Buzz and Woody must fight for their lives in a gladiatorial arena, it falls to Trixie the triceratops to save her friends by convincing him of his true nature. Short animated comedy spin-off from the Pixar series, with the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen and Kristen Schaal.(n)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Underwater princess Ariel becomes bored with her aquatic existence and spends her time spying on humans, much to the annoyance of her father. Longing to live on land, she strikes a deal with a banished sea witch in order to become human and meet a prince - but there is a price to be paid. Disney's animated adventure, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes and Rene Auberjonois.(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
programme.desc: Two monsters work for an energy firm that employs scary creatures to sneak into children's bedrooms and convert their screams into power. However, when a little girl accidentally wanders into the pair's domain, they have to race against time to return her safely home before anyone finds out. Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn.(n)

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: A basketball coach takes over a college team in 1960s Texas, but his decision to recruit black people causes uproar. Determined to enlist the best players possible, he sets out to lead his team to the national championships. Sporting drama based on a true story, starring Josh Lucas, Jon Voight and Derek Luke.(n)

programme.title: The Finest Hours
programme.desc: An oil tanker suffers devastating damage while caught in a fierce Atlantic storm, which breaks the vessel in two. While an engineer tries to keep the crew members trapped in the sinking wreckage alive, members of the Coast Guard brave the deadly conditions to come to their rescue. Fact-based disaster movie, starring Chris Pine, Casey Affleck and Eric Bana.(n)

programme.title: Man of the House
programme.desc: A youngster is doing his best to make life hell for his potential stepfather and sabotaging all his plans to marry his mother, when a series of unforeseen events brings the pair closer together. Disney comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Farrah Fawcett, Jonathan Taylor Thomas and George Wendt.(n)

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement.(n)

programme.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
programme.desc: A deformed bell-ringer living reclusively in a cathedral in the heart of medieval Paris is tempted out of seclusion when a gypsy festival arrives and captures his imagination. Here in the outside world, he learns the cruel government minister who raised him is hatching a plan to wipe out the gypsies, so he resolves to protect his new friends. Disney animation, with the voices of Tom Hulce, Demi Moore and Kevin Kline.(n)

programme.title: The Fox and the Hound
programme.desc: An orphaned fox cub is taken in by a kindly widow, and becomes firm friends with a puppy belonging to a hunter. However, as they grow to adulthood, the dog is trained to prey on foxes, and the two animals realise their friendship may not survive as they are expected to be natural enemies. Animated adventure, with the voices of Mickey Rooney and Kurt Russell.(n)

programme.title: Finding Nemo
programme.desc: Clownfish Nemo becomes separated from his friends on the Great Barrier Reef - but the thrill of being able to swim freely and away from his overprotective father turns to horror when he is netted by a diver. His distraught dad sets out on a mission to find him, while the youngster finds himself in a dentist's tropical tank. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Inside 11-year-old Riley's head lives a team of five that controls her emotions. Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Fever
programme.desc: Animated short featuring the characters from Disney's Oscar-winning Frozen, with the voices of Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel and Josh Gad.(n)

Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn.(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha.(n)

programme.title: Lady and the Tramp
programme.desc: A pet cocker spaniel fears her owners will reject her when they become parents, and the arrival of two villainous siamese cats in the house leaves her feeling more unwelcome. Driven from her home, she encounters a roguish stray mongrel, who introduces her to his carefree life on the streets. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Barbara Luddy, Larry Roberts and Peggy Lee.(n)

Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, Barry Humphries and Geoffrey Rush.(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungle, leading a carefree life with his friends, a laidback bear and a wise panther. The return of a ferocious tiger who hates humans places the youngster's life in danger, and his friends must persuade him to return to the safety of his own people. Disney animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, with the voices of Phil Harris and George Sanders.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Inside 11-year-old Riley's head lives a team of five that controls her emotions. Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith.(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
